p:
Even though Zn is an essential micronutrient for a healthy body, extreme amounts of zinc can be destructive, and cause Zn toxicity
56, 57 . High levels of Zn can interrupt the balance of other essential minerals to sustain healthy life, such as Fe and Cu
10 . Anthropogenic Zn is common in car lubricants, tires and Carburettors
58 .
